title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Classroom Visits
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Classroom Visits                Classroom Visits        NPS Photo   Â    Denali Days -- Ranger Visit to Your Classroom  Every spring our Education Rangers visit classrooms in the Denali and Matanuska-Susitna Boroughs to teach students about Denali's biological, physical and cultural sciences. Programs are typically offered in April and May, and are generally one hour in length. There is generally one subject offered per year, but programs may be modifiable to meet curricular needs.   We strive to deliver multiple programs per school per day. If you would like to have a ranger come to your school, please coordinate scheduling with fellow teachers and then contact us at dena_education@nps.gov.
